module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: The Skrill fee structure is a competitive 1.2%+0.29 and 1%+0.29 for Instant bank transfer. * Fees apply to new merchants only. From 1st March 2021. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 300M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 300M users. With this free official module, benefit from our advanced commerce platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell..

module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell...
module.additional_description: Synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

badge.label: Save time: Partner of the year

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty, including Pay now, Pay later, and Financing options. The latest version 2.1.27 and v1
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty, including Pay now, Pay later, and Financing options. The latest version 2.1.27 and v1.7+ also include Klarna’s On-Site Messaging Feature.
module.additional_description: Klarna Checkout has everything you need to convert browsers into happy customers – making shopping easier than ever. Offer Klarna Checkout for a seamless, mobile-optimised solution, requiring minimum input from your customers. By investing in a checkout solution that is always kept up to date – with the customer experience in mind – you’ll get more customers who will buy more and do it more often. The On-Site Messaging feature continues the smooth journey, increasing risk-free sales through tailored messaging and showing your customers available financing options while they’re still shopping. Advertising the ability to pay later, before checkout improves sales. On-Site Messaging provides customized messaging ranging from banners promoting your partnership with Klarna and availability of payment options, to personalized promotions on product or cart pages. Customers are identified from their first interaction, so the shopping experience can be tailored to suit their needs. Klarna deliversOne-click repeat purchasesGlobal support, local optimisationKlarna absorbs all credit and fraud riskAn easy integration Your benefitsBoost conversionIncrease average order valueSupport and guidanceOptimised user experience To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Checkout, sign up here: https://eu.portal.klarna.com/signup/?products=kco&platform=prestashop

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Popular live chat for Prestashop stores. Start a personal conversation with your visitors and turn them into happy customers
module.author: Smartsupp
module.description_full: Popular live chat for Prestashop stores. Start a personal conversation with your visitors and turn them into happy customers.
module.additional_description: Description Smartsupp chat enables you to start a personal conversation with your visitors and turn them into happy customers. Choose one of the most popular chat solutions in Europe, used by 283 000 webshops and websites.  See detailed visitor info in the powerful web dashboard. Chat with customers on the go in our mobile apps for both iOS and Android. Engage visitors using automatic messages. Measure your customer care quality with detailed statistics. Get a better understanding of customer behaviour thanks to visitor recording. Your customers are browsing your website right now. Create a free account and start chatting with them today.

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creati
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creation, re-entering credit card information, and typing their billing and shipping addresses. The performance is continually optimized by Amazon’s technology, learnings, and best practices.
module.additional_description: Reduce friction at checkout: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks. Amazon automatically recognizes when shoppers have an active Amazon login, so they don’t need to sign in again.Enhance brand trust: The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust, and that trust halo extends to Amazon [1]. Furthermore, the Amazon Pay A-to-Z Guarantee helps raise customer confidence with buying online.Delivery Notifications: Proactively alert customers on the arrival status of physical goods orders via Amazon Alexa [1]Rest assured with advanced fraud protection: An active base of online shoppers also helps reduce decline handling and fraud risk.Make it easier for international shoppers to buy: Multi-currency support reduces friction in the checkout process by maintaining the local currency experience across the shopping journey and helps customers avoid currency conversion fees from their credit card issuer or bank.Easily and flexibly integrate Amazon Pay into your store: Built-in support for strong customer authentication as required under Payment Services Directive (PSD2). With 91% of Amazon Pay customers saying they would use Amazon Pay again and hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers already enabled for Amazon Pay, it can help you increase sales [2]. [1]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [2]:Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate, fight fraud, and go global as you scale with the easiest way to accept online payments. ​Install Stripe's module on your PrestaShop online store and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Increase checkout completion by accepting credit and debit cards in 135+ currencies, wallet payments like Apple Pay and Google Pay, and local payment methods like SEPA Direct Debit,  iDEAL, Bancontact, P24, EPS, Giropay, FPX, Alipay, and more. Fight fraud with machine learning that trains on hundreds of billions of data points. Stripe processes payments from 195 countries and millions of businesses. Even if a card is new to your business, there’s an 89% chance it’s been seen on the Stripe network before. Stripe supports PSD2 regulations in Europe and is SCA-ready. Stripe scans every transaction to dynamically trigger additional authentication only when required.  Rely on a trusted and secure payment provider. Stripe has been audited by a PCI-certified auditor[0] and is certified to PCI Service Provider Level 1. This is the most stringent level of certification available in the payments industry. Our pricing is fully transparent. No setup fees, monthly fees, or hidden fees. You only pay for successful transactions. View pricing at our website[1]. Custom pricing available for companies with large payments volume or unique business models. Feel free to contact our Sales team[2]. [0] http://www.visa.com/splisting/searchGrsp.do?companyNameCriteria=stripe[1] https://stripe.com/pricing[2] https://stripe.com/contact/sales

module.name: psgdpr
module.description: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make your store comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
module.additional_description: What is GDPR?   The GDPR is a new EU legal framework that governs how users' personal data is used. It applies to all automated and manual processing of personal data (i.e., collection, conservation, extraction, use, destruction, etc.).   Personal data is information that is used to identify an individual either directly or indirectly (i.e., first and last name, email address, IP address, telephone number, etc.).   Why choose our GDPR module?   The Official GDPR Compliance module by PrestaShop helps you bring your store into compliance with the GDPR. It meets the main obligations of the EU regulations concerning your customers' personal data, including:  The right to access their personal data and their right to portabilityThe right to rectification and deletion of their dataThe right to retract their permission if it had been requested  It also allows you to keep a log of all your customers' activity concerning their private data (notably data accessibility, permission and deletion). You will be able to demonstrate your respect for the regulation's requirements.

module.name: klarnapaymentsofficial
module.description: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0.7 and any future versions, also include Klarna’s On-Site Messaging Feature.
module.additional_description: Klarna Payments enhances your current checkout, offering flexible payment options that empower your customers, giving them choice to pay directly, by invoice or using financing. The Klarna products are Pay now, Pay later and Financing, and all increase conversions and take the friction out of shopping. And that’s not all. No matter which Klarna option shoppers choose, you get paid when that goods ship. The On-Site Messaging feature continues the smooth journey, increasing risk-free sales through tailored messaging and showing your customers available financing options while they’re still shopping. Advertising the ability to pay later, before checkout improves sales.  On-Site Messaging provides customized messaging ranging from banners promoting your partnership with Klarna and availability of payment options, to personalized promotions on product or cart pages. Customers are identified from their first interaction, so the shopping experience can be tailored to suit their needs. Klarna delivers:- Global Compliance- Absorbs all credit and fraud risk- Local support across Europe Your benefits:- Increase in conversions and order value- Reach a new audience- Always get paid To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Payments, sign up here.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: Facilitates international sales Translate your store automatically Glotio is much more than a simple automatic translator tool, is specialized in PrestaShop and it automatically translates many parts of your online store with no need to import/export texts.Multiply your sales, translating your e-commerce shop in more than 50 languages ​​and selling in many countries!  How does it work:Download and install our free module. In the PrestaShop marketplace you can find our certified module. Download it for FREE and create your account in just two minutes.We analyze your store for translatable content. Our simple wizard will guide you in a few steps through the process necessary for Glotio to track your PrestaShop for translatable material.Indicate which languages you want to translate your PrestaShop in. Once we know what content is available to carry out the translation, you can tell us which languages you want us to do it in. The first translation to the 1st language is FREE! Glotio updates your translations whenever you want. The languages that you have translated in our panel will be updated automatically or manually at the time you want, so that you always have your online store updated. KEY TOOLSFind and replace: You can always find some word or string of words that you prefer to replace by another. With this tool it will now be a piece of cake. Excluded words: You will most likely want to not translate certain words, such as brands or suppliers. You can automatically add them to the exclusion list. Smart Dictionary: No one knows the products you sell as much as you or your team, so you can teach Glotio how to translate certain words. What does that product provide you?• Boost your SEO: Glotio respects all the SEO of your default language, in this way you can start the organical positioning in any country you decided to sell using their native language.• International Marketing: Exportable data feed in all languages ​​to start marketing campaigns in new countries and multiply your visits. The translations are saved in your PrestaShop, so you can create a data feed in the different languages.• Increase the conversion ratio because you sell in the language of your customers.• Translate your entire online store (catalog, products, categories, attributes, characteristics, manufacturers, suppliers, attachments, etc.) into more than 50 languages ​​in record time.• Suitable for everyone. No programming knowledge or expert PrestaShop or HTML / CSS required.• You save time. Translate your online store quickly.• You pay only what you translate, with no monthly fees.

Save time with a revamped interfaceYour key figures grouped in a way that makes it easier to read and to analyze themTraffic detailed by acquisition channelUnderstandable, usable, and relevant data Turn insights into actionsGet easy to implement advice and recommendations from our e-commerce experts, which will allow you to optimize your shop's activity and your key indicators SecurityYour data is protected and access is secured from your PrestaShop back office.PrestaShop Metrics calculations intelligently focus on the essential data, and calculate your traffic data in advance, thus maintaining the speed of your shop. module.name: route
module.displayName: Protect & Track Packages - Route PrestaShop Addons
module.description: Create a better post-purchase experience and revenue-driving customer loyalty with Route
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create a better post-purchase experience and revenue-driving customer loyalty with Route. Engage more with real-time notifications, and offer customers package tracking and premium protection against loss, theft, and damage—for free!
module.additional_description: Route empowers merchants to offer the best post-purchase customer experience possible. With the Route Module, PrestaShop merchants are able to offer customers: Package Protection: At checkout, customers can choose to add protection against loss, theft, or damage for just pennies.  Real-time Purchase Tracking: Let customers track their purchase from the warehouse to their doorstep—in real time, on a real map. When shoppers can see exactly where their goods are, they feel at ease and won’t be clogging your customer service lines with questions like “Where is my order?” Easy and Fast Claim Filing: Should something go awry, Route makes it easy for customers to file claims and receive a refund in minutes—all without costs to the merchant. Brand Engagement: Route sends push notifications to customers about their purchase with your store, increasing engagement between them and your brand long after checkout. Adding Route to the customer experience bolsters customer confidence, increases repeat purchases and loyalty, and saves your team time answering tracking questions and resolving claims. With more customers making decisions based on experience, Route makes a premium customer experience possible.

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an Zettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via Zettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to Zettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to Zettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the Zettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and Zettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between Zettle and PrestaShop is based on the Zettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard.  The services include: Zettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The Zettle Reader:The Zettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The Zettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the Zettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Revolut Business’ payment gateway has the unique advantage of being integrated directly with your Revolut Business account. We’ve even created a plugin for adding Prestashop to your website so that you can focus on what matters most: running your business. With this plugin, you’ll be able to accept card payments on your Prestashop website easily and securely. Charge your customers in up to 14 currencies without worrying about pricey exchanges and access your funds quickly with next-day settlement.
module.additional_description: Time and money is our merchants’ most precious resource. At Revolut Business, our priority is to free up more of both for our merchants to enable them to grow their business. Great pricingImprove your margins with our low rates: 1.3% (for all consumer cards from UK and EEA) & 2.8% (for all corporate cards and for consumer cards outside of the EEA). See how our rates compare to other gatewaysNo additional fixed fees per transactionProcess up to £/€ 100,000 per month for free (depending on the plan you select and the cards your customers pay with)  FXCharge and settle in up to 14 currenciesExchange money at the Interbank Rate and avoid unnecessary costs SettlementAccess your funds 24h after your customer pays One place to manage all your business needsBest in class UX with a single interface for both your merchant and business accountsStart for free or get more from your money with our paid plans Take a look at our website to see why accepting payments through Revolut is the right decision for your business.

module.description_full: Get the very best out of essential channels for building your business, namely Facebook and Instagram. Embed Facebook’s ecosystem in your online store with total ease and start to activate new audiences, generate qualified traffic and boost your sales today.
module.additional_description: It offers a simple way to list your products on Facebook and Instagram, find potential buyers and measure your results. Visibility Find new customers: Get all the power of the Facebook Pixel boosted by the Conversions API to connect you with a new audience which is ready to buy. ATTRACT THE RIGHT AUDIENCE Increase your online store’s reach by introducing your products to Facebook and Instagram’s 1.7 billion daily users. IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF YOUR TRAFFIC Launch a targeted acquisition strategy using similar audiences and dynamic advertising. Attract new buyers by automatically creating impactful advertisements straight from your catalogue. Conversion Measure results: Measure your marketing and ads’ performance and get information about your website’s results and how your Facebook tools are generating traffic. TRANSFORM YOUR VISITORS INTO BUYERS You don’t need any coding skills to install and configure the Facebook pixel. Thanks to tracking, it’s easy to measure how effective your campaigns are, optimise your marketing strategy and boost your sales. ENHANCE YOUR BUYING EXPERIENCE Offer your customers a consistent brand experience. Invite them to explore your products and make orders without any hassle, on all devices, straight from your posts. Get rid of the last barriers to customer conversion by embedding Messenger conversations in your online store. Easy Connect with your existing Facebook assets, such as a Facebook product catalogue, Facebook pixel and Facebook page – or create some new ones! Once you have these resources in place, you will be able to access experiences such as Facebook Shops and dynamic advertisements and configure other code-free sales tools to help you sell your products. CENTRALISE ALL YOUR FACEBOOK ACCOUNTS Connect all your Facebook accounts to your PrestaShop store the easy way (including Facebook Business Manager, Facebook Pages, Ad Accounts and Instagram Business Accounts). SAVE TIME BY AUTOMATING YOUR PROCESSES Import your entire PrestaShop product catalogue onto Facebook and Instagram with ease. Your updates are automatically synchronised

module.description: Data privacy regulators are stepping up enforcement actions and many websites are still vulnerable. Is yours? Consent Management tools mitigate legal risks while securing your data capture
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Data privacy regulators are stepping up enforcement actions and many websites are still vulnerable. Is yours? Consent Management tools mitigate legal risks while securing your data capture.
module.additional_description: Don’t risk your advertising revenue and start your journey towards GDPR compliance now with a free 15-day-trial.  Data Privacy regulations and cookie laws are complex. Many businesses like you used to struggle with GDPR compliance. Data privacy regulators such as French Data Protection Authority CNIL are stepping up enforcement actions and many websites are still vulnerable. What about yours? Your data quality is our priority. A compliant Consent Management tool helps mitigate legal risk, secure data capture and increase revenue - by collecting, managing and documenting the consent of your website visitors in a legally compliant way and making sure opt-in rates can easily be optimized. As you know, since the GDPR came into effect in May 2018, data obtained without consent may not be used for marketing purposes. Many businesses are finding out that working with us can relieve stress and increase advertising revenue. Don’t risk losing valuable data and ad revenue and get started now. It’s the fast and easy way to become GDPR-compliant! Your one-stop shop cookie banner solution: Your fully customizable banner design and messageCustomize your banner design in accordance with your CI and choose your design from a selection of different layouts (available for the Business Version) and banner message (available for the Standard Version). Obtain consent in accordance with the lawAchieve legal compliance with all common requirements. Take advantage of the provided step-by-step guidance and built-in resources to find peace of mind regarding compliance.No data lossKeep benefiting digital marketing opportunities and avoid any loss of advertising revenue.Compatibility with all common marketing toolsContinue to use all your existing marketing tools such as Analytics, A/B Testing, Tracking and Retargeting - and be compliant at the same timeAutomatically identify implemented technologies when installing the CMP using our ScannerDetect all technologies that are being used on your website and always have a full overview of them.

All cardholder data is processed on our servers, and fully compliant with PCI-DSS. Your customers will always have a secure way to complete their payments. Fraud Prevention SystemOur in-house fraud prevention system can identify fraud transactions before they take place to prevent chargebacks and other fraud. Thanks to machine learning, our system adapts automatically and stops fraud in its tracks

module.name: tradedoubler
module.description: Grow is a self-service, performance-based, affiliate marketing solution for small businesses, start-ups, and accelerators
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Grow is a self-service, performance-based, affiliate marketing solution for small businesses, start-ups, and accelerators. Thanks to our convenient 1-click installation, setting up your Grow account on PrestaShop is especially easy.
module.additional_description: Grow is built on Tradedoubler's affiliate network of over 180,000 active affiliates. When you join Grow, we provide you with the tools needed to search for and recruit your own affiliates from our network, and also present your program to these affiliates so that they are able to access your marketing assets (banners, product feeds, voucher codes, etc.), and discover more about your company, its products/services and what your affiliate program offers them. Once your program is up and running, we take care of all the administrative tasks so that you can focus on what is most important – driving sales for your business. For all recorded activity, Grow presents you with useful statistics and information that provide insights on clicks, conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), ad impressions, sales information, and much more. Benefit from our no-commitment, low fee offering and start immediately driving sales through your affiliate program.
